name: Sigma
description:
Sigma

Sigma is a Figma plugin of automatically generate SwiftUI code from Figma


Video

Document

GitHub


Supported

  • VStack
  • HStack
  • LazyVGrid
  • LazyHGrid
  • Image(systemName:)
  • AsyncImage
  • Text
  • TextField
  • Button
  • Divider
  • Spacer
  • ScrollView
  • List


and some modifiers too.


How to use?

  1. 🐣Select layer
  2. 🧸 Exec Sigma from plugin list
  3. 📖After, It is shown dialog with SwiftUI code
  4. 📋Tap [Copy to Clipboard] Button
  5. 🔜Paste SwiftUI Code to Xcode from clipboard
  6. 🛠Run it
